name: Magicka: The Other Side of the Coin
name_original: Magicka: The Other Side of the Coin
description:
Magicka: The Other Side of the Coin is an action-RPG game developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Magicka: The Other Side of the Coin on PC.
